      studentDOB - Students date of birth

    • addExamResult

      public void addExamResult(int moduleID, int studentID, int examResult)
      Adds an exam result to the database
      Parameters:
      moduleID - Module id used as a unique identifier
      studentID - Student id used as a unique identifier
      examResult - The grade achieved by the student in the module
